verses.name: Romans 1:1
verses.text: Paul, a servant of Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, separated unto the gospel of God,

verses.name: Romans 1:2
verses.text: (Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures,)

verses.name: Romans 1:3
verses.text: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord, which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh;

verses.name: Romans 1:4
verses.text: And declared to be the Son of God with power, according to the spirit of holiness, by the resurrection from the dead:

verses.name: Romans 1:5
verses.text: By whom we have received grace and apostleship, for obedience to the faith among all nations, for his name:

verses.name: Romans 1:6
verses.text: Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ:
